title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: a lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a built-in model registry and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, embed and list models with Node.js or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embeddings, pull/push models, streaming responses.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama: chat, embeddings, tool-calling and retrieval chains with local models.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints, dark/light themes.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI for Ollama with REPL, syntax highlighting, chat history and shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots with autocomplete and chat panel.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) and compose snippets for running Ollama in Docker.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, push, embeddings, streaming.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java / Android client for Ollama with fluent API and reactive streams.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama: generators, chat generators and embedders for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF Q&A, voice chat, function-calling, fine-tune adapters, LangGraph agents.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama builds and dev shells with CUDA and ROCm variants.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that test and benchmark Ollama models inside containers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to chat with local documents.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that exposes Ollama models via slash commands with role-based rate limits.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server to expose Ollama as a backend for Claude Desktop and other MCP clients.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted writing using local Ollama models with custom prompts.

title: ollama-npm
summary: npm registry page for the official ollama JavaScript package with weekly download stats.
